statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT source, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE source = 'Online' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, source, revenue, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE revenue < 500 ORDER BY source ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT id, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE source = 'Online' ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT source, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY source ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_data
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE source = 'Online';
SELECT sale_date, source, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM revenue_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY sale_id HAVING total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT source, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY source ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data_source;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_id FROM sales_data_source;
SELECT sales_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount ASC;
SELECT trend_name, total_revenue, trend_date FROM revenue_trends WHERE total_revenue > 1000;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name FROM revenue_trends WHERE trend_date IN ('2022-01-01', '2022-01-31');
SELECT * FROM sales_data_source WHERE data_source_id IN (SELECT data_source_id FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000) ORDER BY data_source_name DESC;

SELECT data_source_id, data_source_name FROM sales_data_source JOIN sales_data ON sales_data.data_source_id = sales_data_source.data_source_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY data_source_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, total_revenue FROM revenue_trends ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, trend_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales_amount, MIN(sales_amount) AS min_sales_amount, MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT data_source_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY data_source_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, revenue, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 5000;
SELECT source_name, region FROM source_info WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT source_id, total_revenue FROM revenue_sources ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT trend_date, trend_value FROM revenue_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_id, category FROM source_info WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT sale_date, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT source_name, total_sales, total_revenue FROM source_info JOIN revenue_sources ON source_info.source_id = revenue_sources.source_id;
SELECT sale_date, revenue, category FROM sales_data JOIN source_info ON sales_data.source_id = source_info.source_id WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM product_sales
SELECT product_id, sale_date, quantity FROM product_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT source_name, location FROM sales_data_source WHERE location='New York'
SELECT trend_date, revenue_amount FROM revenue_trends WHERE revenue_amount > 10000
SELECT analysis_date, trend_id FROM sales_analysis WHERE trend_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM sales_data_source WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, quantity FROM product_sales WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT location, source_name FROM sales_data_source ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT summary_date, total_revenue FROM revenue_summary WHERE total_revenue < 100000 ORDER BY summary_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_date, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_trends GROUP BY trend_date HAVING total_revenue > 50000;
